template_info.name: Business-Driven Epic Template
template_info.usage: Convert audit findings and stakeholder priorities into development epics

epic_structure.title: [EPIC] - [Business Objective] - [Technical Implementation]
epic_structure.business_driver: Audit finding or stakeholder priority that justifies this work
epic_structure.epic_format: To achieve [business_outcome], we need [technical_capability] so that [stakeholder_value]

steam_launch_readiness.business_value: Enable revenue generation through Steam marketplace
example_epics: Steam Integration Epic - Implement Steamworks features for platform compliance
Performance Optimization Epic - Ensure stable performance on target hardware
Save System Epic - Implement reliable save/load for user progression

technical_debt_mitigation.business_value: Increase feature delivery speed and reduce maintenance costs
example_epics: Architecture Modernization Epic - Reduce coupling for faster development
Testing Infrastructure Epic - Enable confident releases and reduce bugs
Performance Foundation Epic - Establish performance monitoring and optimization

feature_completeness.business_value: Meet market expectations and differentiate from competitors
example_epics: Core Gameplay Polish Epic - Deliver satisfying player experience
Roguelite Enhancement Epic - Increase replayability and retention
Audio/Visual Polish Epic - Meet quality expectations for target price point

user_experience_optimization.business_value: Reduce churn and increase positive reviews
example_epics: Player Onboarding Epic - Reduce learning curve and early abandonment
Accessibility Epic - Expand addressable market through inclusive design
UI/UX Modernization Epic - Meet current user interface expectations

critical_business_priority.success_metrics: Revenue impact, user acquisition, market readiness

activities: Define user stories and acceptance criteria
Create test scenarios and validation plans
Coordinate with marketing and business strategy
